name: GF Stripe Extensions
author: James Low

sections.description: Add Stripe functions to WordPress including ApplePay, analytics, query transactions, limit payments and payment recovery to Gravity Forms. Apple Pay buttons and JavaScript work without Gravity Forms.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/gf-stripe-extensions directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Implement functionality:
    • Use [gf_stripe_applepay] function
    • Implement ApplePay JavaScript
    • Set the number of payments fo each feed in the form settings
    • Setup payment recovery
sections.faq:
1. How do I enable Apple Pay logging:
    • Create form with standard fields
    • Add recurring / process payment checkboxes with value of 1
    • Add a stripe feeds for single and recurring payments and enable conditional logic for recurring / process payments checkboxes

short_description: Add Stripe functions to Wordpress including ApplePay, analytics, query transactions, limit payments and payment recovery to Gravity Forms.
description: Add Stripe functions to WordPress including ApplePay, analytics, query transactions, limit payments and payment recovery to Gravity Forms. Apple Pay buttons and JavaScript work without Gravity Forms.
